The Software Verification Plan document outlines the planned tasks and expectations for verification of Software Requirements.

  • WHO will be responsible for completion, review, and approval of these tasks.
  • HOW the verification will be performed including failure resolution.
  • WHAT documentation/deliverables will be generated.



All the Software requirements in the following specification need to be verified:

For every milestone the "Software Design Verification Test"  needs to be performed and must pass. See: 

* *{testrun-label:Software Design Verification Test}*

At the end of a milestone the "Software Design Verification Test" must pass. When it does, the Test Run needs to be marked as "Passed".

If the test is failing, the QA manager is responsible to decide if the Test Cases will be deactivated and moved to next milestones.
